overview: Lene is experiencing temporary insanity. She's a temp on loan to an interior design firm. Soon her brazen sexuality begins to drive away clients and eventually she drives a wedge between the man and woman who owns the business. Austin Ellison, of popular Forever Young fame, presents his vision of sex and work and the conflicts that start around the water cooler and end in a flurry of bedroom passion. Lene. Tina Tyler. Rebecca Bardoux. Asia Carrera. One more tempting than the other. Ah...the joys of secs.
tagline: She was a temp who was looking for something permanent.
title: Tempted
